hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Creative cluster consisting of various multifunctional spaces, workshops, studios and music schools

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: COLLIDER is a creative cultural cluster created to unite various forms of art, technology and creativity under one roof. We strive to create a unique environment where talented people can experiment, interact and create new art forms.
mission.p2: The name COLLIDER reflects our philosophy - we create a platform for the collision of ideas, cultures and creative energies, which as a result of interaction give birth to something new and unique.

sound.title: Sound Systems
sound.description: World-class professional sound equipment for concerts, parties and sound recording.

light.title: Lighting Solutions
light.description: Comprehensive lighting equipment, projections and laser systems for creating unique visual effects.

workshops.title: Workshops
workshops.description: Spaces for creativity where artists, designers and craftsmen can work on their projects.

education.title: Education
education.description: Conducting master classes, lectures and educational programs in the field of audio and visual art.

member1.name: Alexander Petrenko
member1.bio: Event organizer with 10 years of experience in the music industry.

member2.name: Maria Kovalchuk
member2.bio: Sound engineer and lighting designer, worked on the largest festivals in Ukraine.

member3.name: Andrey Zayets
member3.bio: Visual artist, curator of art exhibitions and art installations.

member4.name: Yulia Mazur
member4.bio: Coordinates all projects and events, has experience in managing cultural initiatives.

event1.title: Cluster Opening
event1.description: Grand opening of COLLIDER as a multifunctional platform for creativity and cultural events.

event2.title: Residency Development
event2.description: Launch of a residency program for artists, musicians and technical specialists in the field of audio-visual art.

event3.title: International Cooperation
event3.description: Establishing partnerships with international cultural centers and creative organizations.

event4.title: Space Expansion
event4.description: Opening of new premises, studios and workshops, launch of an educational program in sound and lighting design.

contact.title: Join Us
contact.description: Are you an artist, musician, producer, designer or just interested in art? We are always open to new ideas and collaborations.
